Operation Types¶

Operation types module

This module defines the optypes list and API functions used to manage operation types.

exception daffy.vm.optypes.OperationTypeNotFoundError[source]¶

Operation error

daffy.vm.optypes.dvm_operation_type_register(op)[source]¶

Register a new type in the optypes list

daffy.vm.optypes.dvm_operation_type_find(type)[source]¶

Return an optype from the list of registered types
